step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arms straight overhead and fingers spread wide as you begin.
Excellent! Continue stretching your arms overhead with fingers open.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale here.
Well done stretching arms back overhead and exhaling. Relax your shoulders.
Nice work completing the first repetition! You're doing great.
Second rep starting strong! Keep those arms straight overhead and fingers spread.
Good continuation. Keep reaching overhead with open fingers.
Excellent fist and shoulder blade squeeze. Remember to inhale as you tighten.
Nicely done extending arms overhead and exhaling. Relax and reset.
Fantastic job finishing the second repetition! You've completed the exercise.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms straight overhead with fingers open, then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Inhale as you tighten, and exhale as you relax and stretch back overhead.
